title: (x) cardiac evaluation center - Poster Bodoni, Times {Mark S}
author: popinfresh

comments.content: The bottom two lines are Times or Times New Roman (hard to say for sure which). The "cec" is some form of Bodoni Bold, but it doesn't match any off-the-shelf version I know of. It's very Bodoni-like, but the crossbar on the "e" is lower than usual. Could be custom or an old film font.

I think you're right Mark. I think Poster Bodoni is the closest, but I think it was 'tweaked'. Here are my attempts to re-create this:   
 ![cec simulations](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128000525im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39228.gif)

Thanks   
I went with adobe's poster bodini at 73%. That did the trick.   
   
Thanks again for your help.   
-Dave
